Welcome to Emotion Classification Evaluation
In this app we want to evaluate the performance of our speech emotion recognition model. I this app we will ask you to record voice messages in 5 different emotional states: neutral, happy, sad, angry, fearful. To bring you into an emotional state. We will describe a situation for each emotion and ask you to record a response to the given situation. But this are just examples. If you have an better idea you can also record an different text. Important is that you try to do it in the given emotional state. The duration of you record should be around 1 minute or longer.
In the end we will ask you to share the results with us. So that we can evaluate them. Your records are analyzed on the device (NOT in the cloud) and will NOT be part of the send and analyzed data. Only the requested emotional state and the classification results are part of it. If you continue with the next steps you allow us to automatically analyze you records.
Emotion Classification Test Run
This is the Test Run. It will make you familiar with the app. Tab on the action button on the bottom left to start the voice recording and tab it again to stop it.
